item.title: 观看直播：ABC 新闻直播间提供当天的头条新闻和最新报道，现在即可观看。
item.description:
WATCH LIVE: ABC News Live has the day's top stories and up-to-the-minute reports, streaming now. https://t.co/W5IxIUTp1k

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 最新消息数十名亲乌克兰战士周二声称已越过边界入侵俄罗斯，这可能是自全面入侵开始以来越过边界发动的最大一次袭击。
item.description:
JUST IN: Dozens of pro-Ukrainian fighters claimed on Tuesday to have launched an incursion across the border into Russia, in what may be the largest attack over the border since the start of the full-scale invasion. https://t.co/j5aVtYfvSg pic.twitter.com/AsnGq64FHk

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：周二，数十名亲乌克兰战士声称他们用坦克和装甲车越过边境入侵俄罗斯，这可能是自全面入侵开始以来规模最大的一次越境袭击。
item.description:
JUST IN: Dozens of pro-Ukrainian fighters claimed on Tuesday to have launched an incursion with tanks and armored vehicles across the border into Russia, in what may be the largest attack over the border since the start of the full-scale invasion. https://t.co/DH9bkmsZNI

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：俄罗斯国防部称，一架载有 15 人的俄罗斯货机在莫斯科东北部伊万诺沃附近坠毁。
item.description:
BREAKING: A Russian cargo plane carrying 15 people crashed near Ivanovo, northeast of Moscow, the Russian Defence Ministry said. https://t.co/C6hMyguT9I

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 警方称，在墨西哥一条高速公路边的墓地里发现了一具自今年 2 月起失踪的 54 岁妇女的尸体。
item.description:
The body of a 54-year-old woman missing since February has been found in a cemetery on the side of a highway in Mexico, police say. https://t.co/iWCMNXnp3v

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 一位发言人说，具有分裂性的社交媒体名人安德鲁-泰特（Andrew Tate）和他的兄弟特里斯坦（Tristan）在罗马尼亚被拘留，并收到了英国签发的逮捕令。
item.description:
Divisive social media personality Andrew Tate and his brother, Tristan, were detained in Romania and handed arrest warrants issued by the U.K, a spokesperson said.

The warrant detailed charges that included "allegations of sexual aggression." https://t.co/UDiK6LBMlH

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 将于周二公布的通胀数据将揭示最新的物价走势，这对于正在权衡降息的央行行长和将注意力转向大选的选民来说是一个关键的经济信号。
item.description:
Inflation data to be released on Tuesday will reveal the latest price movements, a key economic signal for central bankers weighing interest rate cuts and voters turning their attention to the general election. https://t.co/lU857H0MNp

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 根据皮尤研究中心（Pew Research Center）的一份新报告，近四分之三的美国青少年表示，当他们不带手机时会感到快乐或平静。
item.description:
Nearly three-quarters of U.S. teens say they feel happy or peaceful when they don't have their phones with them, according to a new report from the Pew Research Center. https://t.co/kk0prvkVOv

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 生日快乐："歌舞厅 "明星莉莎-米内利今天 78 岁。
item.description:
HAPPY BIRTHDAY: "Cabaret" star Liza Minelli is 78 today. https://t.co/eqb5qVB5cC pic.twitter.com/zPPW6BH9aq

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: Airbnb 周一发表声明，决定禁止使用室内监控摄像头，以 "优先保护我们社区的隐私"。
item.description:
Airbnb has made the decision to ban the use of indoor security cameras to “prioritize the privacy of our community,” according to a statement from the company on Monday. https://t.co/R7fBqMKBiD

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 据报道，美国疾病预防控制中心正在向芝加哥派遣一个小组，帮助卫生官员应对该市自 2019 年以来发现的首例麻疹病例。
item.description:
The CDC is reportedly sending a team to Chicago to help health officials respond to the first measles cases detected in the city since 2019. https://t.co/HtttpU4WxY pic.twitter.com/xn1SVks9JB

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）支持的共和党全国委员会（Republican National Committee）新领导班子已开始对全国党务人员进行清理。
item.description:
A new Donald Trump-backed Republican National Committee leadership team has started the process of cleaning house among national party personnel. https://t.co/uxmdZcD7zL

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 摇滚乐和流行乐界的一些大腕将联手纪念音乐传奇吉米-巴菲特的一生。
item.description:
Some of the biggest names in rock and pop are joining forces to celebrate the life of music legend Jimmy Buffett. https://t.co/AxZK0WOYIp

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 网络红人安德鲁-泰特（Andrew Tate）的发言人周二表示，他在罗马尼亚被拘留，并收到了英国当局签发的逮捕令。
item.description:
Online influencer Andrew Tate was detained in Romania and handed an arrest warrant issued by British authorities, his spokesperson said Tuesday. https://t.co/sl5gFFOjI4

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 据新闻报道，两名越野滑雪者在日本最北端的北海道主岛发生的雪崩中丧生。
item.description:
Two backcountry skiers have died in a mountain avalanche on Japan’s northernmost main island of Hokkaido, according to news reports. https://t.co/Af2EqXQTTT

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 艾米莉-布朗特（Emily Blunt）和弗洛伦斯-普（Florence Pugh）在周日的奥斯卡颁奖典礼上都穿上了礼服，不仅引人注目，而且似乎打破了地心引力。
item.description:
Both Emily Blunt and Florence Pugh wore dresses to the Oscars on Sunday that not only stood out, but also appeared to defy gravity. https://t.co/q85ZNcGmxN

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：胡塞武装发射反舰弹道导弹，美国实施防御性空袭。
item.description:
JUST IN: U.S. conducts defensive airstrikes as Houthis fire anti-ship ballistic missiles. https://t.co/7YjXrt5cLz

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 一位 100 岁的二战老兵将与他 96 岁的未婚妻结婚，他们计划在 80 年前美军登陆的法国海滩附近的一个小镇举行婚礼：
item.description:
A 100-year-old World War II veteran is getting married to his 96-year-old fiancée — and they plan to hold the ceremony in a town near the French beaches where U.S. troops landed 80 years ago.

Learn more: https://t.co/If5JK0Ws68 pic.twitter.com/iaQ4TmCe0G

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: Airbnb 周一宣布，将在下月底之前禁止在其网站上的全球房源中使用室内监控摄像头。该在线租赁平台表示，它正在寻求 "简化 "其监控摄像头政策，同时优先考虑隐私问题。
item.description:
Airbnb announced Monday it's banning the use of indoor security cameras in listings on its site around the world by the end of next month.

The online rental platform said it is seeking to “simplify” its security-camera policy while prioritizing privacy. https://t.co/x9SD1LMYj2 pic.twitter.com/dKNCltrwnY

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 女演员克里斯蒂娜-阿普尔盖特（Christina Applegate）和杰米-林恩-西格勒（Jamie-Lynn Sigler）首次公开谈论她们共同的健康问题：多发性硬化症。
item.description:
Actresses Christina Applegate and Jamie-Lynn Sigler are opening up for the first time together about the health battle they both share: multiple sclerosis. https://t.co/urVp0225Ra

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 一对名为 "杰基 "和 "影子 "的秃鹰在加利福尼亚大熊山谷照顾它们的巢穴时，吸引了成千上万的观众通过直播观看。
item.description:
A bald eagle pair named Jackie and Shadow have drawn in thousands of viewers via livestream as they tend to their nest in California's Big Bear Valley.

The nest contains three eggs which experts are concerned won't hatch since they are past the typical incubation period. pic.twitter.com/3oAfVtUyvg

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 周一在牙买加举行的一系列紧急会议结束时，加勒比共同体主席伊尔法安-阿里（Irfaan Ali）表示，海地代理总理阿里尔-亨利（Ariel Henry）已经辞职。
item.description:
At the conclusion of an emergency series of meetings Monday in Jamaica, Caribbean Community Chair Irfaan Ali said acting Haitian Prime Minister Ariel Henry has resigned.https://t.co/1VrtNmm8XZ pic.twitter.com/mourAdo8VK

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 美国海岸警卫队官员周一表示，上周在南加州海岸附近发现的油膜可能是由海底的自然渗漏造成的，但具体来源尚不清楚。
item.description:
An oil sheen spotted off the Southern California coast last week may have been caused by a natural seep from the ocean floor, but the exact source still isn't known, U.S. Coast Guard officials said Monday. https://t.co/IjbahyTQCu

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 新泽西州参议员鲍勃-梅嫩德斯（Bob Menendez）周一对新的联邦起诉书中的妨害公务指控表示不认罪，该起诉书是对他已面临的贿赂和腐败指控的补充。
item.description:
New Jersey Sen. Bob Menendez pleaded not guilty Monday to obstruction charges contained in a new federal indictment that added to the bribery and corruption charges he already faced. https://t.co/SFB7Sx5mPS

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 周一在牙买加举行的一系列紧急会议结束时，加勒比共同体主席伊尔法安-阿里说，海地代理总理阿里尔-亨利已经辞职。
item.description:
At the conclusion of an emergency series of meetings Monday in Jamaica, Caribbean Community President Irfaan Ali said acting Haitian Prime Minister Ariel Henry has resigned.https://t.co/ZdcobWAxhT

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 当局称，上周末在新泽西州伍德布里奇的一户居民家中发生了一起明显的狗袭击事件，造成一名婴儿死亡，孩子的父母受伤。
item.description:
An infant was killed and the child's parents injured in an apparent attack by a dog at a home in Woodbridge, New Jersey, over the weekend, authorities said.

The baby was pronounced dead at the scene. https://t.co/OzGxnML2s6 pic.twitter.com/wO8Wk4GW0a

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 一个由近二十多个进步团体组成的联盟发起了一项耗资七位数的努力，以捍卫国会中批评以色列在加沙发动军事进攻和美国继续支持以色列的进步民主党人。
item.description:
A coalition of nearly two-dozen progressive groups have launched a seven-figure effort to defend progressive Democrats in Congress who have criticized both Israel's military offensive in Gaza and continued U.S. support for Israel. https://t.co/uugv2R2xlj

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 为了鸟儿在马德里，一位街头艺人在弹奏吉他时吸引了一群麻雀，其中一只有羽毛的观众落在了他的手上。
item.description:
For the birds: A street performer draws a crowd of sparrows as he strums his guitar in Madrid, with one feathered audience member landing on his hand. pic.twitter.com/f4wXWx7AXe

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 纽约州总检察长莱蒂娅-詹姆斯（Letitia James）的律师在周一提交的一份法庭文件中称，应要求唐纳德-特朗普及其同案被告交纳保证金，以支付民事欺诈案中的 4.64 亿美元判决。
item.description:
Lawyers for New York Attorney General Letitia James argued that Donald Trump and his co-defendants should be required to post a bond to cover the $464 million judgment in their civil fraud case in a court filing Monday.https://t.co/SFORdeCHHj

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024

item.title: 共和党领导的众议院委员会的一份新报告称，特朗普的前白宫助手卡西迪-哈钦森（Cassidy Hutchinson）关于她被告知时任总统唐纳德-特朗普在 1 月 6 日的行动的证词与特朗普当天的司机的证词存在部分矛盾。
item.description:
Former Trump White House aide Cassidy Hutchinson's testimony about what she was told of then-President Donald Trump's actions on Jan. 6 was contradicted, in part, by Trump's driver that day, a new report from a Republican-led House committee claims.https://t.co/TzEk6p1Yt9

— ABC News (@ABC) March 12, 2024
